item.title: Hire me
item.description:
==> Unveiling Excellence in Software Engineering:

My Expertise:

  • Financial Markets: I’ve had the privilege of serving some Hedge Funds and Proprietary Trading Firms, where my software solutions have managed trading portfolios, risk assessment models, and financial forecasting tools. Deep knowledge in Futures, Options, Stocks and Fixed Income assets, set me in a privilege software development position.

  • Machine Learning and AI: From predictive analytics to complex AI systems, I’ve been at the forefront of integrating machine learning into business operations. My experience includes working on machine learning models for financial marckets, AI-driven medical devices that are changing the landscape of healthcare diagnostics, and Generative AI (GenAI) for pharmaceutical research leveraging the power of LLMs models.

item.title: About me
item.description:
==> Expert in Software and Beyond

Multifaceted developer with a strong academic background and years of practical experience. Here’s a snapshot of the qualifications:

  • Master’s Degree in Stock Markets and Derivatives.
  • Master’s in General Navy Corp.
  • MicroMaster in Software Development.
  • Engineer Certificate in Industrial Engineering.

Career snapshot:

  • Military (Spanish Navy)
  • Data Collection & Analysis.
  • Machine Learning and GenAI.
  • Financial Markets.
  • Cybersecurity.
